definition: family/clan

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

definition: a family tree
The Sopranos (US TV series)

sentences.english: Sometimes I think we all watched too many episodes of “The Waltons.
sentences.chinese: 有时，我觉得我们都看了过多的《沃尔顿家族》剧集。

sentences.english: Suntory is a private, family-run firm.
sentences.chinese: 而三得利是一家私营的，家族经营的公司。

sentences.english: Genetic counseling should be considered for individuals with a family history of albinism or hypopigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 遗传咨询应考虑个人与家族病史白化或色素缺失。

sentences.english: Each Ojibwa tribe was divided into migratory bands.
sentences.chinese: 奥吉布瓦人各部落都分为若干迁徙性家族。

sentences.english: My family has watch over the emperor's tombs for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，我们的家族都在皇陵守护着。

sentences.english: The Kennedy family occupies, for the moment, a place of equilibrium and purity.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪家族目前正掌控着一个和谐而纯洁的领域。

sentences.english: The stone and grass thousands years love, four families with Chang.
sentences.chinese: 顽石幽草千年恋，四大家族衰与昌。

sentences.english: In eats machine in the family, the antisubmarine aircraft is submarine's natural enemy.
sentences.chinese: 在吃机家族中，反潜机是潜艇的天敌。

sentences.english: Members of the Ampatuan family couldn't be reached to comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者暂时无法联系到安帕图安家族成员进行置评。

sentences.english: When Henrik and his German father become Nazis , the family had changed.
sentences.chinese: 当汉力克与他的德藉父亲参加纳粹后，家族变质。

sentences.english: The authoress has edited out all references to her own family.
sentences.chinese: 女作家将所有涉及其家族的内容全删掉。

sentences.english: But the family tree doesn’t stop there.
sentences.chinese: 但是家族谱并不会止于此。

sentences.english: His family operates factories and mines .
I’m the black sheep of my family, in that sense, ” she said.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点上说，我可能是家族的叛逆者，”她说。

sentences.english: Chapter Four researches Wen's family writers at the end of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第四章对明末文氏家族作家进行研究。

sentences.english: Teddy was the last of the greats.
sentences.chinese: 泰迪一是家族中的最后一位人物。

for many generations/generation/era/age

to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)

successor

heir/successor
